Edinburgh Photographic Society

Photography Groups

Edinburgh Photographic Society hosts several special interest groups focusing on different aspects of photography. These groups provide opportunities for members to explore specific areas of interest and develop their skills.

Creative Digital Group

The Creative Digital Group explores creative photography techniques and digital image manipulation.

Learn More

Nature Group

The Nature Group focuses on wildlife, landscape, and natural history photography.

Learn More

Phoenix Group

The Phoenix Group specializes in black and white photography and darkroom techniques.

Learn More

Photobooks Group

The Photobooks Group focuses on creating and publishing photography books and collections.

Learn More

Edinburgh Photographic Society

Founded in 1861, Edinburgh Photographic Society welcomes all who share an interest in photography – from the complete beginner to the most skilled photographer.
